name: Candy House
description:
Candy House is a game made for Ludum Dare 34, with the theme of "Growing".
Link to the Ludum Dare profile: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=p...

It's a stealth game. You play as a child with growing headaches and a growing desire for freedom. You are in search of "candy", but you can't let the guards see you...

If you can't get enough "candy"... Your dreams just might come true.

Controls:
Use the arrow keys or WASD.

----

Differences of Post-jam version:

-> Much smaller file size (from 38 to 22 mb in PC version)
-> Fixed bugged guard
->All resolutions (and full screen) now working
--> "Paint smugde" buttons on main screen

--

Credits:
-Programming: Vitor Lanna (me)
-Art: Raffael Oliveira
